definition: to come together (to form sth)/to assemble together/(chemistry) to polymerize
to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

pinyin: ju4 he2 zi1 xun4 ding4 yue4

sentences.english: Still, I'd like to see more innovation in content aggregators on the iPad.
sentences.chinese: 我依旧想在iPad内容聚合器上看到更多的创新。

sentences.english: Researches on the two-photon photopolymerization technology of a Zr-based inorganic-organic hybrid material have been processed.
sentences.chinese: 飞秒激光掺锆有机无机杂化材料双光子聚合工艺研究。

sentences.english: Frame of the pistol is made from polymer.
sentences.chinese: 手枪的枪架是利用聚合物做成的。

sentences.english: Which needs the support from all circles of society.
sentences.chinese: 新母城的建设需要聚合全社会多方面的力量。

sentences.english: The linear rods are supported by engineered polymer plastic bushings.
sentences.chinese: 线性棒支持的聚合物塑料套管。

sentences.english: Viscosity improvers are polymers with molecules that expand when they get hot.
sentences.chinese: 粘度改良剂是聚合物分子，当他们得到扩大热点。

sentences.english: Annular groove and three lubrication holes in the outer ring; covered with a polymer band.
sentences.chinese: 外圈带环形槽和三个润滑孔，有聚合物带覆盖。

sentences.english: Researches on the two-photon photopolymerization technology of SU8 negative photoresist have been processed.
sentences.chinese: 飞秒激光SU8负性光刻胶双光子聚合工艺研究。

sentences.english: Chemical modification was carried out by the radical polymerization of KH-570 and acrylate monomer.
sentences.chinese: 改性后的树脂具有丙烯酸树脂和有机硅聚合物的优点。

sentences.english: Salt tolerance and temperature resistance properties of this dipolymer were investigated preliminarily.
sentences.chinese: 初步考察了该聚合物的耐盐抗温性能。

sentences.english: Synthetic resin of acrylate was prepared with solution polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 用溶液聚合法制备丙烯酸酯合成树脂。

sentences.english: This is solid state up here, aggregates of atoms.
sentences.chinese: 这是固体，是原子的聚合物。

sentences.english: It is the polymerization of units linked end-to-end that forms the characteristic chains of macromolecules.
sentences.chinese: 这些单位的首尾聚合，形成大分子的特有连锁。

sentences.english: Polymers of vinyl chloride or of other halogenated olefins, in primary forms.
sentences.chinese: 初级形状的氯乙烯或其他卤化烯烃聚合物。

sentences.english: Topic-specific aggregation is rising in importance and quality.
sentences.chinese: 特定主题的信息聚合无论在价值还是品质上都在提高。

sentences.english: The advantages and disadvantages of different polymer-based Chiral stationary phases are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 重点介绍了手性聚合物固定相的分类和应用的新进展。

definition: to collect/to compile/to converge/also written 彙集|汇集[hui4 ji2]
to condense/to coagulate/coacervation (i.e. form tiny droplets)/aggregation/coherent
a mixture/an amalgam/fusion/welding together/to be in harmony with (nature)/to harmonize with/to fit in
